job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of integrating AI functionalities into software systems, covering both front-end and back-end aspects, aligning with building and deploying software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: This implies responsibility for the full lifecycle and components of a product, which is a broad software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions 'architect and code web applications' and 'integrate both front-end and back-end components,' which are core software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: The focus here is on 'create autonomous tools and interactive features' using AI technologies, indicating the building of applications that leverage AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes managing the full software development lifecycle, which falls under software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: Working with stakeholders to meet needs implies understanding business/user requirements and aligning technical solutions with them.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency
job_tasks.justification: This is a summary statement of the core task: developing and delivering AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the emphasis on full-stack integration and building comprehensive solutions as a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on building new applications and driving innovation, which are key aspects of software development.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
push the boundaries of what's possible.
Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key

profile.rationale: The job description emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as architecting, coding, integrating front-end and back-end systems, and owning the product development lifecycle. While it involves working with AI technologies like LLMs (GPT-4, Claude), the core responsibility is to build and deliver AI-powered applications, fitting the definition of AI-Adjacent Software Engineer where tasks are predominantly from Macro-Category A and the output is an AI-powered system.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly stating the blend of software engineering and AI integration, and contrasting it with specialized AI roles. This clarity allows for a high-confidence classification.
